titleStmt.title: [Receipt for Cherokee Annuity] 1812 July 13, Highwassee Garrison : a machine readable transcription of an image

publicationStmt.publisher: University of Tennessee Special Collections Library

availability.p: This work is the property of the Special Collections Library, University of Tennessee, Knoxville, TN. It may be used freely by individuals for research, teaching, and personal use as long as this statement of availability is included in the text. For all other use contact the Special Collections Librarian, Hoskins Library, University of Tennessee, 1401 Cumberland Avenue, Knoxville, TN 37996. (865) 974-4480.

bibl.title: [Receipt for Cherokee Annuity] 1812 July 13, Highwassee Garrison
bibl.note: This document is a receipt dated July 13, 1812, acknowledging that the Cherokee Chiefs received an annuity payment from Return J. Meigs for nine thousand dollars. The document is signed by several Chiefs of the Cherokee Nation.

projectDesc.p: Created for the University of Tennessee Digital Library

editorialDecl.p: Quotation marks retained as data except inside q tags
Errors in transcription of the printed text controlled with X-Metal 2.1 spell-checker; text has also been thoroughly proofread.
Corrections and normalization represented by editorial tags.
Catchwords and directional notes such as "turn page over" have been omitted.

refsDecl.p: ID attributes provided for only those pages, chapters, or illustrations toward which a reference or figure points.

div1.p: We the Chiefs of the Cherokee Nation do hereby acknowledge to have Rec,d of Return J. Meigs Agent to the Cherokee Nation Nine Thousand Dollars in full of the Annuity due for the year 1812 Agreeable to the foregoing claims viz paid by him as witness our hands and seals

closer.signed: The GlassEach signature has the x mark and then a handwritten seal beside the nameRichard Taylor Jno Walker Interpreter Jno Lowry Jno McLemoreJno Ross Clk of Committee Jno McIntoshJno BoggsJno ArmstrongJno JollyPr Luis WJK RegtJno NattyClosenceSickekeeThe BarkTeyasteskee

figure.figDesc: Miscellaneous names and calculations that have been crossed out.

add.p: Receipt of the Cherokee Chiefs for their Annuity for the year 1812.
